title: The Gray Ghost
description: When crime haunts the night, a silent crusader carries the torch of justice. Those with evil hearts beware, for out of the darkness comes The Gray Ghost.
altHero: the Gray Ghost, a caped hero, stands in a smokey doorway
alt1: two bad dudes threaten a man with chains
alt3: a ransom note from the Mad Bomber
alt4: the Gray Ghost emerges from smoke plumes
